detectors.description:
DBI.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DBI.sol#36-45) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DBI.sol#38)
	- balances[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DBI.sol#39)

detectors.description:
DBI.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DBI.sol#47-57) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DBI.sol#49)
	- balances[from] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DBI.sol#50)
	- allowed[from][msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DBI.sol#51)

detectors.description:

	- DBI.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DBI.sol#22-24)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:

	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DBI.sol#5)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:

	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DBI.sol#6)
